description: Specifies the contents and locations of Wangscape output tilesets.
title: Wangscape tilesets schema

items.description: Specifies the terrains, filename, resolution, and tile resolution of a Wangscape output tileset.
items.title: Tileset schema

___resolution.description: Specifies the resolution of tiles in the tileset.
___resolution.title: Tile resolution schema

___terrains.description: Specifies the IDs of the terrain types used in the tileset.
___terrains.title: Tileset terrains schema

___x.description: Specifies the horizontal resolution of the whole tileset.
___x.title: Tileset x resolution schema

___y.description: Specifies the vertical resolution of the whole tileset.
___y.title: Tileset y resolution schema

___filename.description: Specifies the filename of the image containing the tileset.
___filename.title: Tileset filename schema
